utilities
Class DateTimeService

java.lang.Object
  utilities.DateTimeService

public class DateTimeService
extends java.lang.Object

copyright (c) 2009-2010 e-Amrita - Giampietro Zedda Turin (ITALY)

DateTimeService

Utilities di semplificazione gestione e formattazione date. Vengono esposti tutti i metodi della classe Java.Calendar. Ulteriori metodi semplificati sono disponibili con prefisso _ (underscore).

Since:
21/03/2010
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Giampietro Zedda
See Also:

isValidDate

public static boolean isValidDate(java.lang.String date,
                                  java.lang.String mask)
Gets if the string date is a valid date.

Parameters:
date - as a string to validate
mask - as the format like MM/dd/yyyy, MM-dd-yyyy, MM.dd.yyyy, dd.MM.yyyy etc.

getDate

public static java.util.Date getDate(java.lang.String date,
                                     java.lang.String mask)
Gets an object date parsing a string with a mask.

When a parsing error occurs, a null value will be returned.

Parameters:
date - as a string to parse
mask - as the format like MM/dd/yyyy, MM-dd-yyyy, MM.dd.yyyy, dd.MM.yyyy etc.

compareDate

public static int compareDate(java.util.Date date1,
                              java.util.Date date2)
Compare two date

It will be returned:
0 if date1 = date2
-1 if date1 < date2
+1 if date1 > date2

Parameters:
date - as a string to parse
mask - as the format like MM/dd/yyyy, MM-dd-yyyy, MM.dd.yyyy, dd.MM.yyyy etc.
